page.title: 18Wareham,Local Government.
page.content: {PURBECK DISTRICT COUNCIL;}for housing, waste disposal,environmental health. {PARISH COUNCIL;}care of local amenities but no power beyond those responsibilities. {MAYOR AND ELECTED TOWN COUNCIL {PLANNING ISSUES;}includes a new bypass, oil exploration,and nearby nuclear power station.All involve environmental health. {CONSERVATION; }responsibilities for protection of sites of natural beauty or historic interest. {HOUSING; }more houses being built to replace old ones.800 on waiting list. {ENVIRONMENTAL HEALTH;}deals with noise,nuisance,housing aid and bad licenses.
